title: Extract magic strings to constants
description: 'SKILL.md', 'commands/', 'skills/' are hardcoded strings in 20+ places. Extract to constants in a single location (e.g., internal/artifact/constants.go) for maintainability.

title: Fix ignored JSON marshal errors
description: Multiple places use 'data, _ := json.MarshalIndent(...)' ignoring the error. Found in learn.go:160 and apropos.go:160. Could print partial/empty output on failure. Should check and handle gracefully.

title: Implement remove command - delete artifact files and update state
description: Delete artifact files from ~/.claude/skills/ or ~/.claude/commands/. Update state.json to remove the entry. Confirm before deletion.

title: Create tome-grimoire repo for skills/commands distribution
description: Create a NEW repo (not kennyg/claude-code - that's a fork for upstream PRs) to host skill-apropos and other skills/commands for tome learn distribution. Repo name ideas: claude-skills, tome-grimoire, claude-code-extras. Structure: skills/skill-apropos/, commands/foo/, etc.

title: Setup goreleaser for cross-platform builds and releases
Implement attune command - project setup and AGENTS.md generation
description: Create tome attune command that sets up a project for Tome usage by creating .config/tome/ directory and generating AGENTS.md with instructions for AI agents.

title: Project-local artifact installation by default
Implement learn command - fetch and parse artifacts from GitHub
description: Fetch artifacts from GitHub repos using the GitHub API. Parse SKILL.md files, command markdown files, and tome.yaml manifests. Support owner/repo, owner/repo:path, and direct URLs. Install to ~/.claude/skills/ or ~/.claude/commands/

title: Implement sync command - check for updates and download newer versions
description: Check installed artifacts against their sources for updates. Compare file hashes or git commits. Download and replace updated artifacts. Show diff of changes.

title: Consider refactoring to go-github library
description:
Replace custom GitHub API code with google/go-github library for better:
- Type-safe API responses
- Built-in rate limiting and pagination
- Proper GHE support via custom base URL
- Reduced maintenance burden

Current approach uses gh CLI which works well but requires gh to be installed. go-github would make tome more standalone.

title: Fix silent failures in batch learn operations
description: In learn.go:238-298, when fetching multiple artifacts, individual failures just print warnings and continue. Artifacts that fail are silently skipped with no option to retry or accumulated error list. Should return summary of what succeeded/failed.

title: Setup homebrew tap repository for tome distribution
Plugin support with agent capabilities matrix
description: Add plugin artifact type and track agent-specific capabilities (skills, commands, hooks, plugins, MCP). Start with Claude, expand to OpenCode, Copilot, Gemini, Amp.

title: Rename commands to thematic alternatives (index, study, seek, renew, forget, edition)
Fix hooks.json parsing to match actual Claude format
description: ParseHooksJSON in internal/fetch/plugin.go expects a flat array structure but Claude's actual hooks.json format is nested with event names at the top level. Current: [{matcher, hooks:[strings]}]. Actual: {hooks: {EventName: [{matcher, hooks:[{type,command,timeout}]}]}}

title: Enhance learn command - auto-detect type, support multi-file repos
description: Auto-detect skill vs command based on filename (SKILL.md = skill, other .md = command). Support learning multiple files from a repo at once.

title: Build skill-apropos CLI tool
UI refresh - book/scrolls aesthetic for terminal output
UI overhaul - glamorous terminal experience
Ghostty enhancement: inline parchment/book background image when detected
Implement search command - GitHub search API integration
description: Use GitHub search API to find repositories containing Claude Code artifacts. Search for repos with SKILL.md files or tome.yaml manifests. Display results with interactive selection.

title: Clarify agent capabilities matrix: native vs Tome-supported
description: The AgentCapabilities struct in internal/config/agents.go is ambiguous. It's unclear whether it tracks: (a) what the agent natively supports, or (b) what Tome currently implements for that agent. Need to clarify and possibly split into two concepts.

title: Add unit tests for cmd/ package
description: cmd/ package has zero test coverage. All 13 CLI commands are untested. Need table-driven tests for argument parsing, error handling, and output formatting. Start with learn.go (most complex) and list.go (most used).

title: Add concurrency protection for state file
description: State file (config.go:220-245) has no concurrency protection. Multiple tome instances could corrupt state.json if run simultaneously. Need file locking or atomic write operations.

title: Add test suite for core functionality
description: Add tests for critical paths: artifact parsing (skills, commands, hooks), plugin detection and fetching, state management, and agent capability checks. Start with internal/fetch and internal/config packages.

title: Refactor learnFromGitHub into smaller functions
description: learnFromGitHub() in learn.go is 201 lines. Hard to test and maintain. Split into smaller helpers: parseSource(), fetchManifest(), discoverArtifacts(), installArtifacts().
